m_szDocSumamry: The World’s 10 Most Energy-Efficient Cities The World’s 10 Most Energy-Efficient Cities Posted on Tue, 08 July 2014 21:49 | 0 Reykjavik, Iceland By most measures, Reykjavik tops the list of energy efficient cities worldwide. Along with the rest of Iceland, Reykjavik relies on renewable hydropower and geothermal plants to provide all of the heat, electricity and hot water for its more than 120,000 citizens .
